name: Real Hill Climb Monster Truck
description:
Real Hill Climb Monster Truck is The most addictive physics based car racing game. In Real Hill Climb Monster Truck Control your monster truck to climb with most realistic control to face the challenges of unique uphill & downhill environments.Speed, fast and furious, dangerous ride, these are all the words which come in mind while thinking any kind of vehicle stunts. Jump over thrilling obstacles and speed through terrifying loops! In this game feel the real stunt of real monster trucks. The paths are too difficult to play, try to complete each level in short time and make your best time in each level. While playing this game, you will experience Monster truck racing, monster truck destruction all in one place.
Real Hill Climb Monster Truck Race All Day Long!!!
Do the Real Hill Climb Crazy Monster Truck Race Stunts in this awesome game. Jump and flip forward, or flip backward. Experience a variety of amazing events including massive jumps, loops, backflips, hill climbs, precision platform driving, off-road and uber-cool stunts to amaze the arena! Sometimes you need to lean your Truck front or back from jumping for perfect lending on the ground!
Real Hill Climb Monster Truck is a variety of paint jobs, inspired by the world’s best Trucks! Stunning graphical effects and awesome action compliment the racing action. Smooth game play and no gear-changes in sight! Launch your truck over huge jumps, timing your stunt action to perfection to stop things getting out-of-control. Get behind the steer wheel of your 4x4 RC monster truck and get ready to do literally what the hell you want. Monster Truck legend is all about adventurous escape that’s full of hasty pace and adrenal boosting thrill on the Offroad. Excellent graphics and shrilling sounds will add spice to this thrill.

Features:
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices
- Real Excelent turbo sound
- Multiple Levels!
- Paid game play on app store
